website_summaries.verdict: These lightweight, charmingly sculpted, and chunky toys from the Hundred Acre Wood are an adorable way to distract a baby during bath time.
pros: Includes Pooh, Eeyore, Owl, Tigger, Piglet, and Roo 5-inch tall bath toys
Features mesh bag with dual suction cups and zipper for easy storage
cons: A little pricy, but it’s a 6-toy set

customer_reviews.title: Is this paint safe? What's that smell?
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 15 month old. These bath toys are "huge." The characters are about the size of a water bottle, so they are really big for a little hand. When I opened the carry-bag, it had a strong chemical scent. The rubber figurines have a strong chemical scent that doesn't seem to go away. Of course my son put them in his mouth right away, and Owl's painted on eyes are peeling off---so what's that paint made of? Despite the chemical problem, they are just too big. They take up a lot of space. I thought they were the size of Fisher Price Little People. Wish I returned them!
customer_reviews.author: Stevens Family

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with this Winnie the Pooh Bath Set....
customer_reviews.text: I was very tickled when I opened my package. I was surprised at the generous size for this Bath Set. Very Adorable and I know my Grandson will just love taking his bath with them. The company that made this also added a zippered storage bag that allows for air to circulate for drying and a suction cup to attach to the bath tub. I am very pleased with it and the service I received. It was packaged nicely. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Trin

customer_reviews.title: ... for my son’s 1st birthday party and they were adorable. Now I use them for bath time and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as cake toppers for my son’s 1st birthday party and they were adorable. Now I use them for bath time and he loves them. I’ve only had them for about 2 weeks so I can’t say much about paint chipping off with time but for now they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytie Perez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Pooh Toys
customer_reviews.text: All three of my granddaughters love to play with Pooh Bear and his friends. They are all 3 yrs old and under. It is not super hard plastic. It has some give. The younger ones love to hold them and teeth on them. The older one likes to play make believe with them. They are big enough for younger ones. You don't need to worry about them being swallowed. We haven't used them in the tub because they are always carrying them around to play with outside the tub. I would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: S M

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: These would be perfect if it wasn't for the inferior paint. We had them less than 24 hours and started to notice this.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Nana

customer_reviews.title: Detailed, colorful, and extremely good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I expected. I hated spending $25.00, but these toys are 5-6" tall and extremely durable. They also come in a beautiful zipper case. I realized after I purchased that this is a "Disney Store" item - hence the reason why the quality is so good. Highly recommended. My kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Expect lots of bath time fun with these toys
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend if you like to watch your baby laugh and have fun at bath time. The characters are so well made, the bag attaches to wall with suction caps so you won't have to search for toys at bath time. The mesh bag allows to drip dry. Your baby will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bath toys because they're watertight!
customer_reviews.text: Best this about these is that they're sealed! No holes for water, no mold! We don't use them in the tub but we could since there's no risk that we'd have to throw them out due to the icky mold that grows in bath toys with holes! My baby is a Pooh fiend and these are excellent toys, soft and chewable and also have enough character to be baby action figures!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Elder

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: got this for my grandson because he loves winnie the pooh, he plays with them outside of the tub as well as inside. they are a nice size, wish all the characters were available
customer_reviews.author: Briggie

customer_reviews.title: Good size and quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are not squirt toys. Completely sealed so they cant get mold in them. Good size (about 5 inches tall) and very durable. Soft rubbery material for babies to chew on too.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad. Don’t. Buy. It.
customer_reviews.text: Smells extremely toxic when I first opened it. I wanted to throw it away but my daughter loves it 🙄🙄🙄 so now it’s sitting in the bathtub. Smells ok now, but I will throw it sometime.. in the near future..
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Hon

customer_reviews.title: Well Detailed, Great Assortment of Characters
customer_reviews.text: Details on all characters very nice, not too light and flimsy like some bath toys, storage case made well, my 2-year-old granddaughter loves this. Great assortment of characters.
customer_reviews.author: Akitatwo

customer_reviews.title: Appealing and fun gift!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old granddaughter was crazy about this gift. Every night while visiting her, she was excited to go play with the characters in the tub. They were even super helpful motivators, as each character would take turns shampooing and rinsing her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: These are so adorable! I bought them for my 3 year old’s ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable! I bought them for my 3 year old’s birthday cake and now my son uses them as bath toys. Super cute! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is obsessed with Winnie the Pooh and she loves this set! It's a great set for outside tub, cake displays, table décor or bedroom décor, soo cute!
customer_reviews.author: E. Kraft

customer_reviews.title: NiceNurse
customer_reviews.text: My 2 granddaughters love these characters both in the tub and out.
customer_reviews.author: Nice Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these toys. Ears to chew on, and attractive colors. Safe.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C

customer_reviews.title: Perfecf bath toy, won't grow mold
customer_reviews.text: I love that these don't have a hole for water to get in to, means I don't have to worry about mold! These are a great size and very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Toys
customer_reviews.text: These pieces are a nice size and seem to be made well. They stand up so they can be played with outside of the bath tub as well. The zipper bag with suction cups for the tub is a great idea for storage as well as being a convenient way to travel with these toys.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! The toys are huge! I expected tiny little things but they were a really good size. It also comes with a perfect bag that hangs in the tub for storage. Great value, really pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jmaf

customer_reviews.title: these are great tub toys
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the tub. Grandsons love them. Wish Rabbit was also with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Adorable for any pooh lover!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and the bag looks adorable! I gave 4 stars because there was a strong chemical smell, but I'm sure that will fade. The characters are too cute and looks well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but paint peels
customer_reviews.text: Great size and they are really cute. BUT we haven't even had them a week and the paint is peeling. They were too expensive to be peeling already.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton P. Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and well made.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as table decorations for a baby shower and they were perfect! Bigger than regular party favors you buy and then I was able to gift them to the mother for bath time later!!! I will buy them again for other baby gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old granddaughter loves these. I just wish I could get rabbit, kanga, and Christopher Robbin.
customer_reviews.author: Michele C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my two-year old granddaughter to play with in the bath or pool.
customer_reviews.author: Pita H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a 2 year old. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Bag is sturdy characters identical to actual and don’t take on water dry fast
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing and cute. They don’t take on water which is great for cleaning them and they are adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The figures are quite large and very durable. We ...
customer_reviews.text: The figures are quite large and very durable. We keep them out of the tub and my daughter just plays with them as figurines.
customer_reviews.author: Justin K Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good quality product. So cute and a great size. The suction cups work great too! And no holes so no mold inside!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for bath tub toys! I used them for the topper of a diaper cake for the baby shower as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: The items are very nicely made. They work great in the bath or ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my granddaughter that loves Pooh. The items are very nicely made. They work great in the bath or just for playing.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: All the main characters and a great size for tub
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. All the main characters and a great size for tub. Most importantly, they don't get filled with water and zipper bag is good storage and a place to dry out. Fun for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: KLEPK

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a prop for a business meeting. But if I had a small child I would highly consider it. It's very soft rubber. There's no holes in it so no water can get in them. Large enough that it would not be a choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren love them.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my grandchildren's bath time. They love them. They are bigger than I expected. They are made well and don't have holes in them so water can't get in them. I really like that because yucky water in toys is disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: BarbiDolls

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My 3 year old daughter loves playing with them during bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and safe!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size of the characters and that there was no hole in them to allow water (and mold) in the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Janet K Coons

customer_reviews.title: I like how they are pretty big
customer_reviews.text: Cute bath toys. I like how they are pretty big. I also love how they are sealed so you don't have to worry about mold forming on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A hit with the grandchildren.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two-year-old granddaughter. She was delighted! The other grandchildren, ages 3 through 10, had some fun playing with them too. They are larger than they appear in the picture, pliable, and detailed. A very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved it! The figures are large enough to be ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it! The figures are large enough to be played with as toys, not just for the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Faye S. Touve

customer_reviews.title: These were much better quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These were much better quality than I expected. They're larger than your average bath toy, and the bag is a nice quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Thomson

customer_reviews.title: 7 characters in search of rabbit
customer_reviews.text: All the main characters except Rabbit. Useful for playing with by our Winnie the Pooh besotted 2 yr old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Robert/Linda

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. Bath toys are always a
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for 2 year old. He loved it. Bath toys are always a hit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bathtub or pool time fun for kids. They are easy to grab and hold for the little ones hands.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my two year old niece who loves Winnie the poo and tiger!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy  Madge

customer_reviews.title: love these.
customer_reviews.text: love these...they ended up being bigger than I thought but they were great and my 2 yr old carries them around the house..I used them on his birthday cake as decorations and now he has them as toys.
customer_reviews.author: Leann Blair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best...AND they don't have holes so they won't get moldy in the bath. PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: JoANn Nocella

customer_reviews.title: Nice toys
customer_reviews.text: I was excited because other reviewers said it doesn't collect water. Most of the animals do not, but Owl came with a hole. Still, my daughter, a passionate Pooh fan is enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: TX Bluebonnet

customer_reviews.title: I have purchase two for my grand daughter. One ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase two for my grand daughter. One for her home and one for Yaya's. She loves to play with them while watching Pooh videos.
customer_reviews.author: Odie Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great Pooh toy for toddler
customer_reviews.text: For a little girl who loves all things Pooh, these are great. There's not much on the market for Pooh toddler toys, but she loves having these in the bath, and no chance at them getting moldy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: 18 month old loves them! He pulled them out of his Christmas stocking, one by one, & has been bouncing Tigger & Pooh around since. It was hard to get him to put them down to open his other presents. All the figures are larger than I expected. If your little one is a fan of Pooh, Tigger, & the gang, it doesn't matter that these are bath toys, he'll love them. The bath bag is a nice quality with suction cups to keep in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: The Family

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Fun
customer_reviews.text: These are larger than they look in pic. They are really squishy which my 7 month old loves and they do not have any holes in them so no water gets in them. My daughter loves to chew them. They are really cute but I paid $25 for them. I see the price is up to $36 now. Update: My daughter is now 16 months and still loves these. The paint is coming off Tigger and Piglet where she has chewed his ear. I see the price is now over $100 which is ridiculous. Like I said I paid $25 and they were great investment as they are my daughter's favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: Budgie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids who love Winnie the Pooh!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler daughter loves these, and plays with them all the time. A must have for kids who love the movie!
customer_reviews.author: JPT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is try to convince our granddaughter to get out of the tub. She adores these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for in the bath or out! a Must have for Pooh lovers!
customer_reviews.author: CPerk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It lost 1 star because the paint chipped after the first bath.
customer_reviews.author: mousy_dreamer90

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this set, especially since she has just started getting into "Pooh" and this set contains most of the characters. She has even started taking Pooh to school with her for nap time. The characters are a great size as well, not too small and not too big. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina B.

product_meta.title: Winnie the Pooh and Pals Bath Toy Set in Zipped Bag - Winnie the Pooh, Tigger, Eeyore, Piglet, Owl, and Roo
product_meta.description: Winnie the Pooh, Eeyore, Piglet, Owl, Roo and Tigger too, are sure to make a playtime splash in the bath. It's about time the 100 Acre Wood hit the water!
feature_bullets: Includes: Winnie the Pooh, Tigger, Eeyore, Piglet, Owl and Roo
Reusable neoprene bag with mesh and zip closure
Bag has two suction cups for easy attachment to tub

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars167 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
